title: I Can't Resist That Voice
alternative_title: Sono Koe ni wa Aragaenai ; Sono Koe niwa Aragaenai ; その声には抗えない
status: Sono Koe ni wa Aragaenai ; Sono Koe niwa Aragaenai ; その声には抗えない
description:
Description :
        "I'm at my limit. I'm gonna stick it in." The sexy voice of his favorite idol echoes directly into his brain, and he's so sloppy he's on the verge of losing his mind...! This is the story of the romance between a closeted otaku and his favorite idol--a popular voice actor! He's unable to admit it to anyone, but college student Asuka Ogami is obsessed with the male voice actor Takaomi Yoshino. One day, a drunk man is sitting in front of the convenience store where he works... when he realizes that it's the real Takaomi Yoshino! Asuka brings him back to his place to look after him and let him sleep in his bed, when suddenly Takaomi forces him down and starts kissing him!! "Hey, I wanna do it!" He says, sucking on the tip of his tongue, his hands wander down to his crotch and around his ass... But when Takaomi whispers to Asuka with his sexy voice, Asuka's body responds irresistibly of its own accord
